message: Being a developer myself, I see a lot of feature requests come in that range from silly to demented. I thought it would be fun to curate a list of some of the funnier ones, in the vein of clientsfromhell.net but geared towards dev instead of design.

I grabbed a domain for it (basicfeature.com if you're interested,) so now there's just the matter of getting people to submit their stories. I'm a lurker on HN, so I'm hesitant to post there for fear of looking like a self-promoting jerk. I'm interested in your thoughts: Would you submit something? How should I go about getting the word out?
do a comment explainign how and why I did this site, an then cross my fingers and hope for the best
I'd just do a post with the "Show HN:" header
Nothing spammy about it as long as you describe what you've built accurately (no linkbait) and let people vote it up or down as they like
Thanks, I posted it as a Show HN
Tip: use clickable links if possible! http://basicfeature.com
